participant_1.name: Ella
participant_1.personality: Curious and lively, Ella enjoys engaging conversations and has a strong passion for animal welfare.
participant_1.background: i've brown curly hair. my bedroom is purple and lime green. i am a vegan. i like riding horses. i'll graduate from high school in two years.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Determined and hardworking, Jake balances his studies and work with a positive attitude.
participant_2.background: i don't like chicken. i recently got an apartment with my best friend. i am in college to become a nurse. i work at a bar at night to pay for college.

content.text: Wow! I dont like chicken neither. Do you like turkey instead?
Are you finishing college this year?
